attributes.action: Pay uk population current earnings to isolate untill COVID19 is completely gone.
attributes.background: Pay everyone to stay at home for a minimum of 12 weeks so they do not get COVID 19 or spread the virus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303345

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
